metadata.author: Deloitte
metadata.description: This rule detetcs When a there is a misconfiguration: container is given privileged mode. When a contatiner is given this mode it receives all permissions the host has
metadata.name: GKE_Misconfiguration

ruleText:
rule GKE_Privileged_container
{

  meta:
    name = "GKE_Misconfiguration"
    author = "Deloitte"
    description = "This rule detetcs When a there is a misconfiguration: container is given privileged mode. When a contatiner is given this mode it receives all permissions the host has" 
    severity = "Medium"
    mitre = "T1068"

  events:

    $e.metadata.description = "GKE Security Posture"
    $e.metadata.log_type = "GCP_SECURITYCENTER_MISCONFIGURATION"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type = "GKE_PRIVILEGED_CONTAINERS"
    $e.metadata.product_name = "Security Command Center"
    $e.security_result.detection_fields["state"] = "ACTIVE"


  condition:
    $e
}
